description: This file defines a mock class `PersistentStoreImplementationMock` for unit testing, which mocks the interfaces `IStore`, `IStore2`, `IStoreCache`, `IStoreInspector`, and `IStoreLimit` used in the persistent storage layer of the project. It includes mock methods for various storage operations such as setting, getting, deleting keys and namespaces, and managing cache and storage limits.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: Mock class for persistent storage interface implementations, used for testing.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback with the store.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Sets a key-value pair in the store.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value associated with a key.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Deletes a specific key from the store.

methods.name: Register (IStore2)
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for IStore2 interface.

methods.name: Unregister (IStore2)
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback for IStore2.

methods.name: SetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Sets a scoped key-value pair with TTL.

methods.name: GetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Gets a scoped key's value and TTL.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Retrieves keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Retrieves available namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Retrieves storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Sets storage limit for a namespace.
